utl_text_templates

Central storage of  Templates

Database Fields
uttm_name

Unique name, part of PK

uttm_type

Type (group) of template, part of PK, defaults to DEFAULT

uttm_mode

Execution mode, alows for different template flavours, part of PK

uttm_text

Template text with replacement anchors

uttm_log_text

Optional logging template, creates log messages if present

uttm_log_severity

PIT severity that sets the output severity, defaults to PIT.LEVEL_VERBOSE
